mapper.update: update errors set num = #{num,jdbcType=BIGINT}, message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, num, message, detail, create_time, update_time from errors
